title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 532/96 of 27 March 1996 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2123/89 establishing the list of representative markets for pigmeat in the Community
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 532/96 of 27 March 1996 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2123/89 establishing the list of representative markets for pigmeat in the Community
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Point 1 of the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 2123/89 is replaced by the following:
'1. The following quotation centre: Brussels.`

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 April 1996.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 March 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 282, 1. 11. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 349, 31. 12. 1994, p. 105.
(3) OJ No L 203, 15. 7. 1989, p. 23.
(4) OJ No L 60, 9. 3. 1996, p. 3.
